comments:
3.2.0 RC2, Build id: I20060428-1315
I'm not sure if it is related more to OO or to the SWT. I was unable to properly start OO StarWriter 2.0 document (sxw) from within Eclipse. On opening, OO complains about some errors (I see empty error dialog from OO). Then I could see the document inside of Eclipse editor area, but *without* the scrollbars. After closing the document tab immediately after that (I didn't changed anything, but OO asks to save the changes, which I do not confirm), and *selecting* any other editor tab, entire Eclipse craches with the error dialog "An error has occured. See the log file <logfile location>". Opening the same file from standalone OO works fine.

In the error log I then see 2 errors:
